edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.primitives

Class BucketMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.primitives.BucketMapping

  • public class BucketMapping
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manage the mapping of bundles into buckets.

    Meaning, given an item, this class returns the id of the bucket where the item should be placed.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)

    • Constructor Detail

      • BucketMapping

        public BucketMapping(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> circuits,
                     byte[] seed,
                     int numBuckets,
                     int bucketSize)
        A constructor that does the mapping of circuits numbers into buckets.
        Parameters:
        circuits - the ids of the circuits.
        seed - A random byte array to use in order to shuffle the circuits.
        numBuckets - The number of required buckets.
        bucketSize - The number of circuit in each bucket.

      • BucketMapping

        A constructor that does the mapping of circuits numbers into buckets.
        Parameters:
        circuits - the ids of the circuits.
        seed - A random byte array to use in order to shuffle the circuits.
        numBuckets - The number of required buckets.
        bucketSize - The number of circuit in each bucket.

    • Method Detail

      • bucketOf

        public int bucketOf(int circuitId)
        Returns the bucket id of the given circuit.
        Parameters:
        circuitId - The id of the circuit that its bucket should returned.

      • getBucket

        public int[] getBucket(int bucketIndex)
        Returns the array represents this bucket.
        Parameters:
        bucketIndex - The id of the bucket that should be returned.
